case_title: SARDAR MUHAMMAD vs Mst. NASIMA BIBI AND Other

key_points.petition_basis: Quashment of two orders under Article 98 of the Constitution.

legal_contentions.contention: Section 9 of the Family Laws Ordinance applies only to inadequate maintenance, not total neglect.
legal_contentions.court_ruling: Rejected; inadequate maintenance includes total absence of maintenance.

legal_contentions.contention: Improper constitution of Arbitration Council and ex parte proceedings.
legal_contentions.court_ruling: Rejected; substituted service was properly effected.

legal_contentions.contention: Arrears of maintenance cannot be granted for past periods under Muhammadan Law.
legal_contentions.court_ruling: Rejected; maintenance can be granted from the date of cause of action or application.

legal_contentions.contention: Allowance granted for both wife and child under Section 9 is illegal.
legal_contentions.court_ruling: Accepted; Section 9 does not provide maintenance for children.

decision.action: Orders quashed and case remanded to Arbitration Council for fresh decision.
decision.costs: Parties to bear their own costs.
